intro: Zeuxine philippinensis, commonly known as the Philippine zeuxine, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Ranunculaceae, which includes buttercups and other related species. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountainous regions and forest floors. Its flowers are small and usually yellow or greenish-yellow, with five petals. Zeuxine philippinensis is characterized by its hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves.
